title: Media Buyer - Ad Specialist
job_overview:
ECL Marketing is a fast-growing performance-based agency helping auto detailers, ceramic coating specialists, and dealerships scale with Facebook Ads, Google Ads, and AI automation systems. We guarantee our clients 75+ leads/month or we work for free — which means our media buyers are a critical part of our success.

We’re looking for a highly skilled, proactive, and results-driven media buyer who also has experience editing video ads. You’ll be handling Meta & Google Ads from strategy to publishing and optimization, making sure our clients get results (low CPLs, high conversions, and strong ROAS).

?

Your Role
 • Launch, monitor, and optimize Meta and Google Ad campaigns
 • Edit short-form video ads (B-roll + voiceover provided)
 • Research creative trends in the auto detailing industry
 • Create, test, and scale winning creatives and ad copy
 • Analyze ad performance and make data-backed decisions
 • Manage UTM tracking, events, and pixel setup
 • Collaborate with our internal Slack team and follow SOPs
 • Maintain client performance across multiple accounts

?

Requirements
 • 2+ years running Meta Ads (Facebook/Instagram)
 • 1+ year managing Google Ads campaigns
 • Strong video editing skills (CapCut, Adobe Premiere, etc.)
 • Proven track record of low CPL campaigns and high ROAS
 • Strategic thinker – can adapt creatives based on data
 • Familiarity with tracking, retargeting, lookalike audiences, custom audiences
 • Fluent in English (verbal and written)
 • Must be available for 40 hours/week (during Pacific Standard Timezone) 
 • Must follow directions, SOPs, and communicate inside Slack
 • Must have a reliable internet connection and working computer

Nice To Have (Not Required)
 • Experience in the auto detailing or local service niches
 • Familiarity with GoHighLevel, Meta, Google, Capcut
 • Can write ad copy and test multiple hooks and CTAs
 • Past experience in an agency setting

Why Join ECL?
 • Work with a performance-based team that actually delivers results
 • Access to SOPs, training, and proven systems
 • Consistent hours and long-term growth opportunity
 • Competitive compensation with performance incentives
 • Work on real client accounts — not just test projects

How To Apply

Please submit the following:
 1. A short intro video explaining your experience
 2. Portfolio or screenshots of ad campaigns you’ve worked on
 3. Edited short-form video ads you’ve created
 4. Resume and your OnlineJobs.ph profile link
 5. Expected hourly rate (in PHP)
